title: Weinstein GUILTY; and where is Evelyn Boswell? Mom says grandma took her. Grandma is in jail.
itunes:title: Weinstein GUILTY; and where is Evelyn Boswell? Mom says grandma took her. Grandma is in jail.
description:
Movie mogul Harvey Weinstein is found guilty on sex charges. What's Nancy Grace's take on his conviction?

And, Tennessee tot Evelyn Boswell has been missing since December. Mommy says grandmother took the child, but the TBI says mom is giving conflicting stories.

Joining Nancy Grace today to talk about these cases:

  • Darryl Cohen - Former Assistant District Attorney, Fulton County, Georgia, Defense Attorney
  • Dr. Bethany Marshall - Psychoanalyst, Beverly Hills 
  • Sheryl McCollum - Forensics Expert & Director of Atlanta Cold Case Investigative Research Institute  
  • Rebecca Rosenberg - NY Post Reporter
  • Josh Devine - Tennessee Bureau of Investigation Communications Director
  • Ray Caputo - Lead News Anchor for Orlando's Morning News, 96.5 WDBO


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
